actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal assistance to cities with high concentrations of foreign-born persons.

summary.text: Provides for Federal assistance to cities with high concentrations of foreign-born persons in order to create employment opportunities for such persons to remedy the disproportionate economic burdens on such cities resulting from high population of unemployed or under-employed foreign-born persons.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal assistance to cities with high concentrations of foreign-born persons.
